overview: Nicki is the kind of girl looking for trouble.  When she finds it, the action gets hot and that makes Nicki get Hot! Nicki's friends are showgirls, lounge-acts, and hopped-up street charmers looking for a hustle! They want dangerous men.  Danger gets these girls wet in the pants and wet in the mouth! When Nicki turns-up dead, Roland, a Private Eye gets a job he can sink his teeth into.... Well, he can sink his COCK into it!
title: True Vice
